body:
## What happened

Unfortunately, I noticed this after the fact, so I'm not sure what triggered it. I know that limits its usefulness, but the bug report tool said I should file the crash here, and I pretty much do whatever IntelliJ tells me.

## Version information

IntelliJ IDEA `2018.1` • Flutter plugin `io.flutter 23.1.3` • Dart plugin `181.4203.498`

Flutter 0.2.3 • channel beta • https://github.com/flutter/flutter.git
Framework • revision 5a58b36e36 (3 weeks ago) • 2018-03-13 13:20:13 -0700
Engine • revision e61bb9ac3a
Tools • Dart 2.0.0-dev.35.flutter-290c576264

## Exception

null

```
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at com.intellij.ui.content.impl.ContentManagerImpl.doAddContent(ContentManagerImpl.java:171)
	at com.intellij.ui.content.impl.ContentManagerImpl.addContent(ContentManagerImpl.java:150)
	at io.flutter.view.FlutterView.displayEmptyContent(FlutterView.java:304)
	at io.flutter.view.FlutterView.access$300(FlutterView.java:64)
	at io.flutter.view.FlutterView$2.lambda$connectionClosed$0(FlutterView.java:272)
	at com.intellij.openapi.application.TransactionGuardImpl$2.run(TransactionGuardImpl.java:315)
	at com.intellij.openapi.application.impl.LaterInvocator$FlushQueue.doRun(LaterInvocator.java:447)
	at com.intellij.openapi.application.impl.LaterInvocator$FlushQueue.runNextEvent(LaterInvocator.java:431)
	at com.intellij.openapi.application.impl.LaterInvocator$FlushQueue.run(LaterInvocator.java:415)
	at java.awt.event.InvocationEvent.dispatch(InvocationEvent.java:311)

	at java.awt.EventQueue.access$500(EventQueue.java:98)
	at java.awt.EventQueue$3.run(EventQueue.java:715)
	at java.awt.EventQueue$3.run(EventQueue.java:709)
	at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
	at java.security.ProtectionDomain$JavaSecurityAccessImpl.doIntersectionPrivilege(ProtectionDomain.java:80)
	at java.awt.EventQueue.dispatchEvent(EventQueue.java:732)
	at com.intellij.ide.IdeEventQueue.defaultDispatchEvent(IdeEventQueue.java:837)
	at com.intellij.ide.IdeEventQueue._dispatchEvent(IdeEventQueue.java:766)
	at com.intellij.ide.IdeEventQueue.dispatchEvent(IdeEventQueue.java:434)
	at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpOneEventForFilters(EventDispatchThread.java:201)
	at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEventsForFilter(EventDispatchThread.java:116)
```

comment_data.body:
Thank you for the report.

This is a duplicate of https://github.com/flutter/flutter-intellij/issues/2040 which has been fixed.

title: Crash report
